phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Amazingly, it turns out Lucy is the daughter of the Heartfilia Konzern!
Phantom Lord was after her, but thanks to the master invoking Fairy Law, our battle with them is finally over.
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
Hey, can you hear me, Gajeel?
So hey, where did you learn Dragon Slayer magic?
I said I could not hear you!
I have never met anyone who used the same magic as me.
You could at least tell me that much!
You were taught by a dragon?
I said I did not know!
Just talkin' to you makes my brains turn to mush.
Wait, that was not 7 years ago on July 7th, was it?
Do you know where Metalicana is?
I am looking for Igneel, a fire dragon.
He also disappeared 7 years ago on July 7th.
On that day two dragons disappeared...
Why is it a bunch of sevens lined up?!
How the hell should I know?
If you are leavin', then scat already.
You are the one that should get out!
Give me a call if you find anything about Igneel,'kay?
Why the hell should I be nice to you, huh?
Because we are both Dragon Slayers!
Do not give me that crap!
Next time we meet, I will kick your ass!
Make sure you have said your prayers.
You are dangerous, you know that?
I thought we could call it even now and make up...
You are the one that is dangerous!
Just look at what you did to our guild!
Well, you busted up our guild first!
I give up makin' nice with you!
They have really made a big mess now...
You have really had a tough time, I know.
Do not give us that face, Lu-chan!
Everyone worked together to beat them.
We all just need to rebuild it.
Sorry for making you worry, Lu-chan.
But nobody thinks this is your fault, Lu-chan.
I am sorry I could not be more help.
but what we can, we should share...
That is what it means to be a guild.
A single person's happiness is everyone is happiness.
A single person's anger is everyone is anger.
And a single person's tears are everyone is tears.
You have no reason to feel guilty.
You should be able to tell how everyone feels...
You are part of the Fairy Tail family.
This is going to seriously anger the Council...
Or wait, if it goes poorly, maybe even imprisonment...
It is been one week since our battle with Phantom ended.
We have finally gotten back our peaceful days...
Everyone, let us take a break!
Although after it happened, it is been super tough.
We were rounded up by the Council's army, the Rune Knights.
That is not going to work Natsu.
You cannot get away from the Rune Knights.
We were dragged to the army post to be interviewed about what had happened.
Every day they would question us, but finally after a week, it calmed down.
It seems like Fairy Tail's punishment will be handed down from the Council at a later date.
I do not think it will be that bad of a punishment.
Since the circumstantial evidence and witness reports all point to an attack from Phantom.
I hope these bruises goes away...
Do you think he was behind the whole thing, pulling the strings?
I know what he is like, but to go this far...
He would not have any problem with this.
But why would he suddenly try and take me back?
It is not like he cares about me personally.
He will do it again, will not he?
Using the power of his money...
That is'because you tried to carry so many at once, idiot.
You are carrying them so daintily!
We are going to rebuild Fairy Tail AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!
She can requip to an outfit like that?
Master's also really getting into it!
Foreman, where do you need this timber?
Is not it kind of big?
While we are at it, we are expanding.
Here is what it will look like when it is finished.
It would be fine without changing it.
What kind of guild is it going to be like?
I do not really get it.
But man, this is really crappy.
Gray-sama is only kind to Juvia!
This is called a character lunch!
Can I actually eat something this insane?
She took 3 days and nights straight to make it!
Is that one of those character lunches?
I want to eat it everyday!
I will give you 30 babies or more!
Would you give these to Lucy?
I was wondering where you would gone off to.
You have been searching for these the whole time?
You do not look good at all.
It is hard being a male feminist...
Her injuries hurt so bad she cannot move, maybe...
Maybe we should go check on her.
You know I cannot handle Celestial Wizards.
Must you be in such a rush?
Do not come in through the window!
And what the hell are you doing?
Something like this was bound to happen eventually...
That is not how it is supposed to go!
Why did you come here, again?
Without Lucy our tempo is all off.
And oh, I am so sorry I suck at comedy.
When would you wear such a thing?
Mom, I finally joined the guild of my dreams, Fairy Tail...
Hey, do not go reading those!
Today, I met a person named Erza.
Are these all letters to her mother?
I wonder why she did not send them?
I made your face on a rice ball, Dad!
I will deal with you later.
So I will leave it right here.
And you see, today it is, um...
I said you were bothering me, Lucy!
Our personal chef cooks our food!
If you have time to do that, then you have time to learn something about running an empire!
I am so glad you are okay, Madame L... Madame L...
I am sorry for worrying everyone.
M'lady, we have some new reference books from the East...
Run off with a lover or two have you?
Have you been keeping up with your magic studies?
I cannot believe we get to see you again, M'lady!
You are all the same as ever, I see.
M'lady... M'lord asks you come to the study at the main residence.
He tells his daughter that ran away and came back to report to him?
He has not changed either, it seems.
When I lived here, I would wear clothes like this.
It is gotten a little small for you, however.
So you have finally returned, Lucy.
I apologize for running away from home without saying anything.
You have made a wise decision.
As long as you are in that guild, I must use my wealth and influence to crush it.
It seems I have made you realize how much trouble your selfish actions because for those around you.
You are the daughter of the Heartfilias.
You are not like other people.
It is fortunate that you finally understand this, Lucy.
There is only one reason I have had you returned.
A marriage with the son of the Jurener family has been proposed.
I figured it was something like that.
A marriage with the Jurener family will allow the Heartfilia Railways to make solid strides to the south.
This marriage with ensure our future fortune.
And you must give birth to a boy.
So he can become heir to the Heartfilia estate.
I have returned in order to show you my resolve.
It is true that I was wrong to leave without saying anything.
It was no different than simply running way.
So this time, I am going to tell you exactly how I feel before I leave!
There is nothing fortunate about having your fate decided for you!
You must grab your own happiness yourself!
I am going to walk my own path.
Do not go deciding on who I will marry.
Do not lay a finger on Fairy Tail again!
If you had not done that, maybe we could be a bit more civil.
But it is too late now.
You have hurt my friends far too much.
What I want is not money, or pretty dresses, or fortune forced upon me...
I am not Lucky Lucy of the Heartfilias any more...
Tail is my other family now, and they recognize me just as Lucy!
It is a far more loving family than this!
I only lived here a little while, but leaving the home I lived in with Mother was incredibly difficult.
Mr. Spetto, Old Man Belo, Mr. Ribbon, Mrs. Aed...
It will be really hard to leave them all...
I think she would tell me You go do what you want to do.
I am really sorry I worried you all.
Do not worry, it is our fault for jumping to conclusions.
I guess we were worried for nothing.
Happy was crying the whole time.
But sheesh, what a spacious town.
It is so calm and peaceful.
Oh, this is not a town.
Our land goes all the way to that mountain over there.
Said it like it is nothing!
Natsu and Gray have been beaten!
Captain Erza, please, give your orders!
To Mom up in Heaven, I am doing well.
I do not think I can live without my friends.
Tail is already a part of me!
All we have been doing is fighting lately...
We would better do some jobs, or we are in trouble!
I wonder if there is some rough job with a good reward that you can do, Natsu?
I can do delicate work, too!
Alrighty then, let us do it!
You do not have to repeat it!
And wait, do you even know what delicate means?
It is where you do not have to punch things...
